question_text: Which of the following best describes the risk of relying on legacy systems in a mission-critical environment?
answer_options: They are easy to secure with modern antivirus tools
They are fully supported by most cloud service providers
They may introduce vulnerabilities due to lack of updates and vendor support
They have minimal impact on overall infrastructure security
correct_answer: They may introduce vulnerabilities due to lack of updates and vendor support
explanation: Legacy systems often go unpatched and unsupported, making them vulnerable to exploits and harder to integrate with modern security tools.
